marklogic.body:
#Homs: Summary of Events, Thursday, March 29, 2012 Part 2
Khaldiyeh | A bullet is extracted from a child shot by a sniper http://youtu .be/Od6M88uonGs al-Shatter building in Homs market Burns after being bombed http://youtu .be/_jOPR5fWO-I Bab Draib | A fallen hero is pulled from under the rubble after bombing destroyed his home http://www .youtube .com/watch?v=QQBVct6KzwM A tank that bombed the historic covered central Homs market http://www .youtube .com/watch?v=dlHlOeOGgAY http://www .youtube .com/watch?v=nTuxP7msiS0 Smoke rises in the sky from the covered Homs market after being bombed http://www .youtube .com/watch?v=zjVXNf6yhuM http://www .youtube .com/watch?v=Y7_qmvC6Ozw http://www .youtube .com/watch?v=D8wUgyPt_M4 Bab Houd | Fallen heroes still in the street, and no one can Reach them, even ten days later http://www .youtube .com/watch?v=GCuQ2GxTaAw Tanks are still everywhere in the middle of the city near the old clock and aiming bombs at stores http://www .youtube .com/watch?v=9yIXZGG4a3E Bab Draib | Pulling a fallen hero from under the rubble http://www .youtube .com/watch?v=NcOuhQewsj0 Inshaat | Destroyed civiliansâ€™ cars near the political intelligence center http://www .youtube .com/watch?v=ARl4Th3lPUg A child who had escaped from the shelling in Baba Amr describes the conditions there, living in a shelter, and does not know anything about his parentsâ€™ whereabout http://www .youtube .com/watch?v=PfO5NKWXeVQ
